reviewText: I really enjoyed season 4 of Ice Road Truckers. It has some exciting scenes in it just like the other seasons. I would recommend this season but not season 1. It has repeated scenes in it and I just didn't enjoy it, maybe because it was the first season.
I got this for my husband for a present and he loves it! I has all of the behind the scenes and all kinds of extras.  He loves it and so do I!

In Season 4 of Ice Road Truckers the true character of each driver shows through more than any other season.
Alex- shows true compassion and puts helping others in front of his dash for the cash.
Hugh- barrels through, load count means everything at the expense of becoming a careless driver.
Jack Jesse-- steady as can be.  Safe and sure driver. Willing to teach/advise drivers who have less experience.
Lisa- trying to drive in an occupation dominated by men. What stands out? Her determination.  New experiences for her in this season  and she did well.
Ray - the rookie driver this year. His goal? To work hard and steady to support his family - Goal achieved.
Last of all Greg-  Immature Chauvinist. Plays games with other truckers on a dangerous road, then pouts like a small child. Grow up!
We received the product from Amazon in good time & it was well packaged. The series is everything that it was on tv.  Excellent viewing.

My husband and I watched the whole season, but he likes the series.  My daughter gave him the first three as Christmas presents and we just added the fourth when Im saw it was avaiable.  If you have not watch the show, I recommend it.  Just don't want to do there job.  More power to them.

I tried to watch Deadliest Roads or whatever the program was with Lisa Kelly and Rick Yemm but I just couldn't.  I hope that Rick enjoys existing on the other side of the world and I can't wait to see Lisa on Season 5!
great.  im fron the u.k but i have several multi region dvd players and cant wait until this 1 comes out.

I really enjoyed the season!  The struggles and triumph's of the participants!  The danger involved in their jobs!  I couldn't wait to see each episode!
Keep up the good work  Ice road truckers this season was competitive and awesome to watch what the ice road truckers do and go through to get items to there destination on time.

I think the only way to buy Ice Road Truckers in on Blu-ray... since the resolution at 1080p is so beautiful and strreaming video just can't hold a candle to it in terms of quality.

3RD season is highly contrived... you can tell they make lots out of any incident or problem that Carlisle Trucking will allow them show film about.
However as far as BS goes, it is soooooooooooo entertaining BS that's worth a watching.

At $5 shipped, how could you go wrong?  I forget how many hours of viewing is on the set but it's a lot.
The scenery is stunningly beautiful and y'know... there is just something really appealing about this kind of jive!

If you want accuracy, don't look to Ice Road Truckers.  It's too much like watching the old WWF fights.
But for sheer all-around entertainment value, I don't see how you can do better!
Really enjoy watching this show.. I really like Lisa and get guts.. She is a strong young lady and I to work in a mans world where I have to prove myself daily!
This the most exciting show I have seen. It has drama, mystery and thrilling events. Can't wait to see each new episode!
I have followed this series for the last two years or more.  It is one of the few reality shows that I truly enjoy.

The producer is also the narrator. He is totally redundant repeating all these disasters that could but never happen. The computer graphics are amateurism and the phoney screams of driver, supposedly plunging off cliffs or sinking into the depths of a frozen sea are quite annoying.
Loved it, shows how great the competition between the truckers can be and just how dangerous the job of hauling valuable and much needed supplies to remote areas on this planet.

My son watched this movie alot.
It was entertaining and history.
He will order the next season of ice road truckers.
The show is extremely well done.  It's exciting at first, but does get a bit monotonous after a full season's worth of episodes.  Still, I recommend it.
Good show to watch.  Sometimes too much made-up drama.  It was great at the beginning, but it seems like some of the situations are now enhanced for tv.
I really enjoy watching this episode.  It is very well documented and presented in a professional manner.  I highly recommend this show.
I'm not a trucker, I don't know any truckers, I have never even seen the inside of a big rig, but this show is fun, exciting, and enjoyable.

I thoroughly enjoyed all the episodes of this complete set and I am considering purchasing further DVD's.
Thanks for the opportunity to purchase and view some outstanding episodes.
Regards, Doreen Clamp.
Great production and wonderful photography.  Every episode is another saga of man against nature and fellow humans.  My wife and I both enjoy it.

Something about it keeps you watching. Maybe because you can't stop holding your breath when they are crossing icy rivers or rolling your eyes when the guys are being competitive. Gotta love Lisa. She just wants to be herself.
I love this show too, it keeps me on my seat every episode, i have great respect for all those truck drivers battling the harsh dangerous landscape! Keep those episodes coming!
